text: Metropina is a genus of flies in the family Pyrgotidae. == Species == *M. nigra Vanschuytbroeck, 1963 *M. richteri Steyskal, 1972 *M. temporalis Enderlein, 1942 == References == Category:Pyrgotidae Category:Diptera of Africa Category:Brachycera genera Category:Taxa named by Günther Enderlein
title: Metropina
